title: BJRMH Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 14 Senior Resident Posts
description: Babu Jagjivan Ram Memorial Hospital (BJMRH) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the 14 vacancies for Senior Resident Positions. Those candidates who have qualified in the MD/ MS, DNB, and MBBS can grab this chance and apply for the BJRMH Recruitment 2025 . If you are looking for more information, like the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts are see below.
